item.title: Experience
item.description: Work PlayPass NV Lead Rails / Elixir / React Developer Nov 2013 - Present PlayPass is a startup (scaling up) that develops software for festival organizers and large venues. It provides solutions for Access Control / Accreditation & Cashless Payments. I am mainly responsible for the architecture and development of the different solutions, with a main focus on the Access control and Accreditation. As a lead developer, I coach other developers and sketched out the future vision of the software.
